definition: 100 ml/one-tenth of a peck/measure for dry grain equal to one-tenth of sheng 升 or liter, or one-hundredth dou 斗
to close/to join/to fit/to be equal to/whole/together/round (in battle)/conjunction (astronomy)/1st note of pentatonic scale/old variant of 盒[he2]
branch of study/administrative section/division/field/branch/stage directions/family (taxonomy)/rules/laws/to mete out (punishment)/to levy (taxes etc)/to fine sb/CL:個|个[ge4]

sentences.english: New taxa of the genus Aspidistra.
sentences.chinese: 四川百合科蜘蛛抱蛋屬新植物。

sentences.english: The Liliaceae plant resources in this area has the latent economic value and the ecology significance.
sentences.chinese: 本地區百合科植物具有潛在的經濟價值和生態學意義。

sentences.english: There are abundant wild flower plant resources of Liliaceae in Henan Province, belonging to 61 species and 16 genera.
sentences.chinese: 河南百合科野生花卉植物資源豐富，有16屬61種。

sentences.english: A preliminary survey and comments on future studies of Chinese Liliaceae.
sentences.chinese: 中國百合科的系統梗概及對今後研究的一些意見。

sentences.english: New species of Reineckia (Liliaceae) from Sichuan.
sentences.chinese: 四川百合科吉祥草屬一新種。

definition: Asteraceae or Compositae (composites), a large family of dicotyledonous plants producing scents, includes aster, daisy and sunflower
Labiatae, the taxonomic family including lavender, mint
Umbelliferae or Apiaceae, plant family containing carrot, coriander etc
Cruciferae or Brassicaceae (taxonomic family including Brassica etc whose flowers have a cross of 4 petals)
Euphorbiaceae (plant family including rubber and cassava)
Asparagaceae, family of flowering plants which includes asparagus
Amaranthaceae, family of herbaceous plants containing Chinese spinach (Amaranthus inamoenus) 莧菜
